metadata.synopsis: The player discovers a large set of animal tracks. They may be able to identify them as those of an owlbear.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Looks like a beast came through here - a big one too.
0.context: NodeContext: Cautious. Spoken in reference to a large set of animal tracks they've spotted.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Owlbear tracks. Its nest must be nearby.
1.context: NodeContext: Spoken with curiosity and a degree of authority - they're familiar with the beast they refer to.
